basic.description: This introductory course provides first-year students with a selection of key skills and theories from across a number of disciplines (History, Sociology, Geography, Film and Media) that will allow them to engage with their further studies and their role in a globalised environment with confidence, intelligence and ambition.
basic.subject: BISC
basic.title: Thinking Locally

extra.enrollment_requirement: Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from BISC100;GPHY101;FILM106
